## üåü COMMON WORKFLOWS

### Morning Standup

Quick check: [01 Core Principles](./01_DIVINE_CORE_PRINCIPLES.instructions.md) - Review checklist

### Starting New Sprint

1. Review sprint features
2. Read relevant domain file ([02 Agricultural](./02_AGRICULTURAL_QUANTUM_MASTERY.instructions.md) if farming)
3. Reference [04 Next.js](./04_NEXTJS_DIVINE_IMPLEMENTATION.instructions.md) for implementation

### Before Committing

1. [01 Core Principles](./01_DIVINE_CORE_PRINCIPLES.instructions.md) - Divine Review Checklist
2. [05 Testing](./05_TESTING_SECURITY_DIVINITY.instructions.md) - Quality Checklist
3. Run tests and linters

### Code Review Process

1. [01 Core Principles](./01_DIVINE_CORE_PRINCIPLES.instructions.md) - Architecture validation
2. Domain-specific file - Pattern compliance
3. [05 Testing](./05_TESTING_SECURITY_DIVINITY.instructions.md) - Test coverage check

### Deployment Day

1. [06 Infrastructure](./06_AUTOMATION_INFRASTRUCTURE.instructions.md) - Deployment checklist
2. [05 Testing](./05_TESTING_SECURITY_DIVINITY.instructions.md) - Monitoring setup
3. [03 Performance](./03_PERFORMANCE_REALITY_BENDING.instructions.md) - Performance validation
